content_html: Birgunj (Parsa), Sept 17: Birgunj metropolis has claimed the loss of some Rs 1.15 billion in the vandalism and arson committed during the Gen-Z protest last week. Chief administrative officer in the metropolitan office, Arbind Lal Karna, said various office buildings received severe damages in the protest. Collection

title: Birgunj metropolis claims loss of Rs 1.15 billion in Gen-Z protest
